item.title: 1st FRANKLIN FINANCIAL CORP 10-K
item.description: 1st FRANKLIN FINANCIAL CORP, which is in the Personal Credit Institutions [6141] industry, SEC 10-K filing on April 11, 2023 had 10859 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 240 instances financial - 143 instances executive - 113 instances 2022 - 100 instances compensation - 95 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
